Coming on the 10th anniversary of Will's first audition for Pop Idol in 2001, 'Echoes' is the follow up to his Platinum selling 'Hits' collection and is his fifth studio album in a career spawning over 8 million sales so far. The sweeping strings and key changes of his hit ballads have made way for synthesised melody, towards something sparer and more controlled.
